quoteText: When we detect spam, malware, illegal content, and other forms of abuse on our systems in violation of our policies, we may disable your account or take other appropriate action.
title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

tosdr.case: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
tosdr.tldr:
EN (quote) : > Do not use our Services improperly.
FR (quote) : > N’utilisez pas nos Services de façon impropre.
